blog.description:
I mostly reblog things and rant about stuff. Also I write sometimes. And I'm nice. on good days.

For those of you on mobile, here are the links you can't see on my pretty blog:
Commissions
What Am I Doing?
Community Writer's Blog
Discord Server

Now Buy Me a Coffee if you appreciate my efforts! ("Coffee" is metaphorical. Coffee is college savings, or savings for my Dream Pride Outfit if you want to bring us closer to pics of me wearing it.)

summary: Me: *sees a picture of a tall dude in an undone suit and tie that go flying around on his body as he walks very fast in a manner...
body:
Me: *sees a picture of a tall dude in an undone suit and tie that go flying around on his body as he walks very fast in a manner that may be taken as almost a run, short hair skewed just enough to scatter loosely over his forehead, one arm behind him in the manner of a deliberate, authoritative march, shoulders hunched in the manner of a person exasperated, frightened, annoyed, or pissed*

My brain: “David Tennant?”

reblog.comment:

My brain: “David Tennant?”

My brain: “David Tennant?”

blog.name: fantasticcloaksandhowtolevitate
blog.title: Yes, I am a Nerd.
blog.description: Formerly pirox2012. Just a small-town girl with big obsessions. Currently: Dr. Strange|TWD|Gilmore Girls|Marvel|The Mentalist|Star Wars|Star Trek|and just about a million other things that I can't think of at the moment. Thanks for visiting my humble blog.

summary: I don’t think I could ever describe how much I love David Tennant
body:
I don’t think I could ever describe how much I love David Tennant

Not only is he the adorable, crazy, weirdo who made me fall in love with Doctor Who; but he is an incredible actor. He is talented in voice acting. He has the best hair. He ages gracefully. His smile could melt the polar ice caps, actually it is probably the cause of global warming. He always looks like he is having so much fun. He plays good guys, he plays villains. I feel like he just loves everything and everyone. He looks like he enjoys life as much as I want to. He is a beautiful man inside and out and I hope he is as happy as he seems because that’s what I want for him.

reblog.comment:

His smile could melt the polar ice caps, actually it is probably the cause of global warming. He always looks like he is having so much fun. He plays good guys, he plays villains. I feel like he just loves everything and everyone. He looks like he enjoys life as much as I want to. He is a beautiful man inside and out and I hope he is as happy as he seems because that’s what I want for him.

Not only is he the adorable, crazy, weirdo who made me fall in love with Doctor Who; but he is an incredible actor. He is talented in voice acting. He has the best hair. He ages gracefully. His smile could melt the polar ice caps, actually it is probably the cause of global warming. He always looks like he is having so much fun. He plays good guys, he plays villains. I feel like he just loves everything and everyone. He looks like he enjoys life as much as I want to. He is a beautiful man inside and out and I hope he is as happy as he seems because that’s what I want for him.
trail.content:
I don’t think I could ever describe how much I love David Tennant

Not only is he the adorable, crazy, weirdo who made me fall in love with Doctor Who; but he is an incredible actor. He is talented in voice acting. He has the best hair. He ages gracefully. His smile could melt the polar ice caps, actually it is probably the cause of global warming. He always looks like he is having so much fun. He plays good guys, he plays villains. I feel like he just loves everything and everyone. He looks like he enjoys life as much as I want to. He is a beautiful man inside and out and I hope he is as happy as he seems because that’s what I want for him.

tags: david tennant does a podcast with...
summary: Ian McKellen joins David for this week's David Tennant Does A Podcast With... to talk about the roles that shaped his career,...
body:
Ian McKellen joins David for this week’s David Tennant Does A Podcast With… to talk about the roles that shaped his career, being gay when it was still illegal, and much more.

Available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or wherever you get your podcasts from: itunes.apple.com/podcast/sir-ian-mckellen
